summary: An extremely simple mod that changes the name of all the gold in Skyrim to Septim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a really simple mod that I originally made for myself (for immersion reasons) and then realized someone else might like it too. All it does is change the name of gold in Skyrim to "Septim" because... well let's face it; that's what the coins are called.

*Edit* I was unaware until now that there is a mod that does essentially the same thing as this one with a similar name. (Just thought I'd put this so nobody accuses me of stealing someone else's idea) So uh... Oops :P

To install just install with the NMM or place the esp in your data folder, and put it low in your load order, just in case any other mods you have installed change gold (for some strange reason).


P.S: If you like this mod, please check out my other mod "Better Soul Trap": http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50943/?
Or my YouTube channel: http://m.youtube.com/channel/UCT5WaaWx8I8oBcbFxCkRQ1w?desktop_uri=%2Fchannel%2FUCT5WaaWx8I8oBcbFxCkRQ1w
author: Paradox
